title: Luke Kuechly’s Retirement, LSU’s Joe Brady to the Panthers, and the Conference Championships | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
At 28 years old, the league’s best linebacker, Luke Kuechly, has retired. Meanwhile, the open coaching positions are getting filled, with Kevin Stefanski headed to the Browns and LSU offensive coordinator Joe Brady heading to Carolina (2:35). Then we preview the Titans-Chiefs and Packers-49ers conference championships matchups (28:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
